title: World’s Largest Bitcoin Domain Portfolio Up for Grabs
description: XBT.com sells for $3M, now Lloyds brings 280+ bitcoin domains to market in one of the most significant domain auctions in crypto history with buyers already lining up. title: Cryptocurrency Market Nervousness Grows
description: Market Overview The crypto market cap fell by another 0.4% to $3.87 trillion. The market is plunging below the former resistance level, raising speculators’ fears of a possible major correction towards $3.6 trillion.
